group.label: Basic data
group.comment:
Wirecard CEE - Your Full Service Payment Provider - Comprehensive solutions from one single source

Wirecard AG is one of the world´s leading providers of outsourcing and white label solutions for electronic payment transactions.

As independent provider of payment solutions, we accompany our customers along the entire business development. Our payment solutions are perfectly tailored to suit e-Commerce requirements and have made us Austria´s leading payment service provider. Customization, competence, and commitment.

General information regarding Wirecard Shop Plugins

field.label: Configuration
field.comment: For integration, select predefined configuration settings or "production" for live systems

field.label: Customer ID
field.comment: Your Wirecard customer number. More information.

field.label: Shop ID
field.comment: Unique ID of your online shop within your customer ID. More information.

field.label: Secret
field.comment: Secret string for signing and validating data to prove their authenticity. More information.

field.label: Backend password
field.comment: Password for backend operations (Toolkit). More information. If this password is not set, online operations on the payment are deactivated and the invoice is automatically captured when the order ist created.

field.label: Order creation
field.comment: Orders created before payment initiation are always kept, even if the payment process leads to a failed payment (FAILURE or CANCEL). Orders created after the payment process, were only kept, if the payment succeeded, pending payments are keeped to, but removed if final state is FAILURE or CANCEL.

field.label: URL to imprint page
field.comment: URL which leads to the imprint page containing contact information. More information.

field.label: Shop prefix in posting text
field.comment: Reference to your online shop on your consumer's invoice, limited to 9 characters.

field.label: Forward consumer shipping data
field.comment: Forwarding shipping data about your consumer to the respective financial service provider.

field.label: Forward consumer billing data
field.comment: Forwarding billing data about your consumer to the respective financial service provider.

field.label: Notification e-mail
field.comment: Receiving notification by e-mail regarding the orders of your consumers if an error occurred in the communication between Wirecard and your online shop. More information. Please contact our sales teams to activate this feature.

field.label: Automated deposit
field.comment: Enabling an automated deposit of payments. More information. Please contact our sales teams to activate this feature.

field.label: Forward basket data
field.comment: Forwarding basket data to the respective financial service provider.

field.label: PCI DSS SAQ A compliance
field.comment: Whether Wirecard Checkout Seamless is PCI DSS SAQ A compliant or not. More information

field.label: Iframe CSS-URL
field.comment:
CSS filename to be included into iframe More information
The filename has to be placed under the view/frontend/web/css folder of the plugin.

field.label: PAN placeholder text
field.comment: Placeholder text for the credit card number field.

field.label: Display expiration date placeholder text
field.comment: Display placeholder text for the expiration date field. Only applicable if PCI DSS SAQ A compliance is enabled.

field.label: Display card holder
field.comment: Display input field for card holder in your credit card form in the online shop.

field.label: Cardholder placeholder text
field.comment: Display placeholder text for the credit card cardholder field.

field.label: Display CVC field
field.comment: Display input field for CVC in your credit card form in the online shop.

field.label: CVC placeholder text
field.comment: Display placeholder text for the cvc cardholder field.

field.label: Display issue date
field.comment: Display input field for issue date in your credit card form in the online shop. Some credit cards do not have an issue date.

field.label: Display issue date placeholder text
field.comment: Display placeholder text for the issue date field. Only applicable if PCI DSS SAQ A compliance is enabled.

field.label: Display issue number
field.comment: Display input field for issue number in your credit card form in the online shop. Some credit cards do not have an issue number.

field.label: Issue number placeholder text
field.comment: Display placeholder text for the issue number field.

group.label: Wirecard Checkout Seamless Credit Card - Mail Order / Telephone Order

field.label: payolution terms
field.comment: Consumer must accept payolution terms during the checkout process. More information.

field.label: payolution mID
field.comment: Your payolution merchant ID, non-base64-encoded.

field.label: Billing/Shipping Address must be identical
field.comment: Billing and Shipping address must be identical.

field.label: payolution terms
field.comment: Consumer must accept payolution terms during the checkout process. More information.

field.label: payolution mID
field.comment: Your payolution merchant ID, non-base64-encoded.

field.label: Billing/Shipping Address must be identical
field.comment: Billing and Shipping address must be identical.

field.label: payolution terms
field.comment: Consumer must accept payolution terms during the checkout process. More information.

field.label: payolution mID
field.comment: Your payolution merchant ID, non-base64-encoded.

field.label: Billing/Shipping Address must be identical
field.comment: Billing and Shipping address must be identical.

field.label: Transaction identifier
field.comment: With this parameter you can define whether a transaction is a single (one-off) transaction or an initial transaction followed by many subsequent ones (e.g. for subscription models). More information.

group.label: Wirecard Checkout Seamless Skrill Digital Wallet
Wirecard Checkout Seamless SEPA Direct Debit

field.label: Transaction identifier
field.comment: With this parameter you can define whether a transaction is a single (one-off) transaction or an initial transaction followed by many subsequent ones (e.g. for subscription models). More information.
